p:
Our frequency prediction model has a total of six free parameters. We jointly fit these parameters to minimize RMSE of serotype frequency predictions via the Nelder-Mead algorithm as implemented in SciPy v.1.0.0 ( Table 2) ( Jones et al., 2001; Gao and Han, 2012). We use
N = 2
years of previous immunity that contribute to antigenic fitness and project
d ‚Å¢ t
= 2
years in the future when predicting clade frequencies.
